name: Nick vs. Satan Claus (Christmas Jam 2018 game)
name_original: Nick vs. Satan Claus (Christmas Jam 2018 game)
description:
This is the prototype game I made for both Weekly Game Jam 76 and Christmas Jam 2018.

WEEKLY GAME JAM - week 76:

  • theme: afterlife

CHRISTMAS JAM 2018:

  • theme: naughty list

I made this game mostly in collage art style.
